name: gh-odin
description: GitHub CLI extension: Turn fuzzy intent into validated GitHub execution plans

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.install-ext: bun run build && gh extension install .
scripts.link: bun run build && gh extension remove odin 2>/dev/null || true && ln -sf $(pwd) ~/.local/share/gh/extensions/gh-odin
